column1: Smoque BBQ////I don't quite concur with a friend who calls Smoque the best BBQ in Chicago
column2: as I don't think their ribs really even compare to Carson's
column3: but Smoque's Chopped Brisket sandwiches is one of my favorite sandwiches in the city. Accompanied by excellent fries
column4: it makes for a great meal at a good price ($6.95/$8.95 with slaw & one side).
